metadata.title: Career Timeline - Soumitra Ghosh
metadata.description: Interactive timeline showcasing career progression and key projects from 1995 to 2025

2025.title: AI-Powered Analytics Platform
2025.description: Leading development of next-gen analytics using machine learning and real-time data processing.

2024.title: Cloud Migration Initiative
2024.description: Orchestrated enterprise-wide migration to AWS, reducing costs by 40% and improving scalability.

2023.title: Microservices Architecture
2023.description: Redesigned monolithic application into scalable microservices using Docker and Kubernetes.

2022.title: Mobile App Development
2022.description: Built cross-platform mobile application serving 100K+ users with React Native.

2021.title: DevOps Transformation
2021.description: Implemented CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure as code, reducing deployment time by 80%.

2020.title: Remote Work Platform
2020.description: Developed collaboration platform during pandemic, enabling seamless remote work for 500+ employees.

2019.title: Blockchain Integration
2019.description: Integrated blockchain technology for supply chain transparency and smart contracts.

2018.title: Machine Learning Pipeline
2018.description: Built ML pipeline for predictive analytics, improving business forecasting accuracy by 60%.

2017.title: API Gateway Implementation
2017.description: Designed and implemented enterprise API gateway handling 1M+ requests daily.

2016.title: Big Data Analytics
2016.description: Developed real-time analytics platform processing terabytes of data using Hadoop and Spark.

2015.title: E-commerce Platform
2015.description: Built scalable e-commerce solution handling Black Friday traffic spikes.

2014.title: Mobile-First Redesign
2014.description: Led mobile-first redesign of legacy web application, improving user engagement by 150%.

2013.title: Operative.One BI Platform
2013.description: Led the BI initiative. Implemented Data Marts, ETL pipelines, Reports and Dashboards. Data Feed. Implemented a multi dimensional availability prediction platform (a key differentiator for Operative.One product suite)

2012.title: Operative.One BI Platform
2012.description: Led the BI initiative. Implemented Data Marts, ETL pipelines, Reports and Dashboards, Data Feed. Used advanced data modeling concepts like Snowflake schema, Conformed Dimensions, SCD, CDC, Lookup Tables. Started working on MD Avails

2011.title: Operative.One BI Platform
2011.description: Led the BI initiative. Implemented Data Marts, ETL pipelines, Reports and Dashboards. Coded the auth itegration between SSRS and Java backend. Trained team Advanced Hibernate concepts

2010.title: Operative.One BI Platform
2010.description: Led the BI initiative. Implemented Data Marts, ETL pipelines, Reports. Trained team on Scrum and Agile practices, TSQL (Pluralsight)

2009.title: Operative.One platform modernization
2009.description: Joined Operative Media's captive center in Bangalore. Led the India development team for Operative.One initiative.

2008.title: Hyperion BI Tools
2008.description: Expanded the India Development Center for engineering work on several of Hyperion products

2007.title: Hyperion BI Tools
2007.description: Built a meta data driven data visualisation and insight exploration product. Led the offshore team of 8 engineers

2006.title: Hyperion BI Tools
2006.description: Incubated working on a meta data driven data visualisation product. Started hiring for the offshore team of engineers

2005.title: Hyperion Central
2005.description: Performance optimisation of SPA using Bindows framework

2004.title: Hyperion Central
2004.description: Rearchitecture to an SPA using Bindows framework. Also worked on performanace test suites.

2003.title: Hyperion Central: Other portlets
2003.description: Integrated Hyperion Planning views and Hyperion Scorecard dashboards in respective portlets

2002.title: Hyperion Central: POV Portlet
2002.description: Implemented a POV toolbar to sync filters between multiple portlets on the same dashbaord page

2001.title: Hyperion Central: Web Page Viewer Portlet
2001.description: Worked on a content aggregation platofmr for Hyperion's enterprise product suite. I implemented a Web Page Viwer portlet: Web scraping of rich websites using a lightweight parser written in Java. Handled JS namespacing issues

1998.title: Project Management Part Paks
1998.description: Gantt Chart and WBS beans for IBM AlphaWorks

1997.title: Project Management Part Paks
1997.description: Gantt Chart and WBS beans for IBM AlphaWorks

1996.title: Software Engineer @ TISL
1996.description: First IT job, trained on Java and SDLC

1995.title: A WAN paging system
1995.description: Final Year Project: A paging system integrating DTMF telephone signals for IIT campus
